description:
With over 12 years of experience in software development, I started in the quality assurance field and evolved into a Tech Lead. I have strong expertise in JavaScript, TypeScript, Java, NodeJS, NestJS, Angular, React, and React Native, along with experience in SQL and NoSQL databases. Currently, I am studying Flutter, improving my English, and exploring the development of my own app.

As a Tech Lead, beyond technical expertise, I focus on team leadership, fostering best practices, collaboration, and efficient deliveries. I have experience in leading complex projects from inception to completion, ensuring high-quality standards and team growth. I am always looking for challenges and opportunities in dynamic and innovative environments.
